__e: You know what I'll do if you don't do what I say.
Peter, if didn't think you were half out of your mind, I'd make you regret that.
But if you did, I would hunt you down like a cheetah.
And your hands could stand a good washing off.
And luckily there were others, who sorely needed my help.
Have a smoke, it'll make you feel good.
"it can be sweet, sour, bitter, and spicy" "while you struggle for life."
Listen, this is very intense, and you're being very sweet... but there is no way that you can relate to what I'm going though.
It made me feel so bitter, and when I found out you were unhappy with this woman, I rejoiced.
